articles.content: A month ago, it was reported that WhatsApp is working on a multi-device feature that would allow people to log in from different devices but now the traces of the feature has been found in the latest Android beta update. WhatsApp started working on the featur… [+2099 chars]

articles.title: Porsche 911 will now come with a new 7-speed manual transmission option - Hindustan Times
articles.description: With the new manual transmission, a Porsche 911 can now hit zero to 100 kmph in just 4.2 seconds.
articles.content:
Porsche has released a new option seven-speed manual gearbox for the 911 , which, since its launch, has been offered exclusively with an automatic eight-speed transmission.
The new option was last year launched in the United States market, where a Porsche sp… [+2614 chars]

articles.title: WFH: Google has 5 video-calling tips for you - Gadgets Now
articles.description: As a species, we’re hardwired for the fast-paced exchange of in-person conversation. When the sound from someone’s mouth doesn’t reach your ears until a half second later, you notice. That’s because we’re ingrained to avoid talking at the same time while mini…

articles.title: Viewing Malicious GIF In Microsoft Teams Could Allow Account Hijacking - Cyber Security News
articles.description: A wormable account hijacking vulnerability in Microsoft Teams could allow an adversary to takeover accounts by sending malicious .GIF files.
articles.content:
A serious vulnerability existed in Microsoft Teams that allowed account hijacking. Simply sending a malicious GIF to the victim could allow an adversary to take over the target account.
Microsoft Teams Account Hijacking via GIF
Researchers from CyberArk hav… [+2368 chars]

articles.title: Galaxy S20 Ultra users now report broken rear camera glass problem - PocketNow
articles.description: Galaxy S20 Ultra users suggest a design imperfection as the reason behind the camera glass breaking without any notable mechanical damage or fall.

articles.description: The upcoming Redmi 10X aka Redmi Note 9 has paid a visit to BIS. It also has spotted by the FCC revealing another variant with NFC support.
articles.content: The Redmi 10X is expected to be the Chinese variant of a new vanilla Redmi Note 9 smartphone. The device bearing the very same M2003J15SI has just received certification from the BIS agency in India. In addition to this, the Redmi Note 9 appeared on the FCC d… [+1225 chars]
